title: Good Charlotte Announce First Album in Seven Years, ‘Motel Du Cap’
caption: 🚀 Good Charlotte is back with 'Motel Du Cap'! 🎶 Get ready to rock out with them after 7 years! 🎸 #GoodCharlotte #NewAlbum

title: Lenny Kravitz Plots First Australian Tour Dates Since 2012
caption: 🌟 Down Under with Lenny Kravitz! 🎸 Australia, are you ready to rock out with this legendary artist once again? 🎤 #LennyKravitz #AustralianTour

title: Ava Max Will Celebrate ‘Don’t Click Play’ With a North American Tour
caption: 🎉 Bust out the glitter, Ava Max is hitting the road! Who's joining the party? 🌟🎶 #AvaMax #DontClickPlayTour

title: Sabrina Carpenter’s ‘Manchild’ Debuts at Number One on Hot 100
caption: 🌟🎶 Congratulations to @SabrinaCarpenter for slaying the charts with 'Manchild'! Who else is dancing to this bop? 💃 #Hot100King #NewMusicTuesday

title: Beyoncé Thanks Paul McCartney for ‘Writing One of the Best Songs Ever Made’
caption: Beyoncé shows love to Paul McCartney for his iconic track 🎶 Legends supporting legends! 💫 #MusicIcons
